mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.ward_code AS "wardCode", a.bed_no AS "bedNo", a.bed_label AS "bedLabel", a.room_no AS "roomNo", a.dept_code AS "deptCode", a.bed_approved_type AS "bedApprovedType", a.bed_sex_type AS "bedSexType", a.bed_class AS "bedClass", a.bed_status AS "bedStatus", a.lend_attr AS "lendAttr", a.lend_bed_no AS "lendBedNo", a.lend_bed_dept AS "lendBedDept", a.lend_bed_ward AS "lendBedWard", a.lock_status AS "lockStatus", a.lock_operator AS "lockOperator", a.aircondition_class AS "airconditionClass", a.patient_id AS "patientId", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bed_rec( id, ward_code, bed_no, bed_label, room_no, dept_code, bed_approved_type, bed_sex_type, bed_class, bed_status, lend_attr, lend_bed_no, lend_bed_dept, lend_bed_ward, lock_status, lock_operator, aircondition_class, patient_id, create_date, create_by, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{wardCode}, #{bedNo}, #{bedLabel}, #{roomNo}, #{deptCode}, #{bedApprovedType}, #{bedSexType}, #{bedClass}, #{bedStatus}, #{lendAttr}, #{lendBedNo}, #{lendBedDept}, #{lendBedWard}, #{lockStatus}, #{lockOperator}, #{airconditionClass}, #{patientId}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bed_rec SET ward_code = #{wardCode}, bed_no = #{bedNo}, bed_label = #{bedLabel}, room_no = #{roomNo}, dept_code = #{deptCode}, bed_approved_type = #{bedApprovedType}, bed_sex_type = #{bedSexType}, bed_class = #{bedClass}, bed_status = #{bedStatus}, lend_attr = #{lendAttr}, lend_bed_no = #{lendBedNo}, lend_bed_dept = #{lendBedDept}, lend_bed_ward = #{lendBedWard}, lock_status = #{lockStatus}, lock_operator = #{lockOperator}, aircondition_class = #{airconditionClass}, patient_id = #{patientId}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT decode(BED_REC.BED_label, null,to_char(bed_rec.bed_no),bed_rec.bed_label) bed_label , (case when INSTR(BED_REC.bed_label,'_')>0 then (select aa.bed_no from bed_rec aa where aa.del_flag = '0'
and aa.ward_code= #{wardCode}
and aa.bed_label = substr(bed_rec.bed_label,1,INSTR(bed_rec.bed_label,'_')-1)) else BED_REC.bed_no end) bed_no1 , BED_REC.WARD_CODE , PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.PATIENT_ID , PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.VISIT_ID ,
decode(PAT_MASTER_INDEX.NAME,null,(select a.name||'的包床' from PAT_MASTER_INDEX a where a.PATIENT_ID =BED_REC.PATIENT_ID and BED_REC.PATIENT_ID is not null),PAT_MASTER_INDEX.NAME) name , PAT_MASTER_INDEX.SEX, PAT_MASTER_INDEX.DATE_OF_BIRTH, floor(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE,PAT_MASTER_INDEX.DATE_OF_BIRTH)/12) age, PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.ADMISSION_DATE_TIME, PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.OPERATING_DATE, PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.DOCTOR_IN_CHARGE, PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.PATIENT_CONDITION, PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.NURSING_CLASS, PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.DIAGNOSIS, BED_REC.BED_STATUS, BED_REC.BED_SEX_TYPE, BED_REC.DEPT_CODE, PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.ADM_WARD_DATE_TIME , BED_REC.BED_APPROVED_TYPE , pat_master_index.charge_type , bed_rec.bed_no, PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.is_newborn, ' ' show_age , (select count(*) from orders where order_status ='1' and patient_id=PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.PATIENT_ID and visit_id=PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.VISIT_ID) order_verify, BED_REC.ID as "id" FROM BED_REC, PATS_IN_HOSPITAL, PAT_MASTER_INDEX WHERE ( BED_REC.WARD_CODE = PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.WARD_CODE(+) ) and ( BED_REC.BED_NO = PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.BED_NO(+) ) and ( PATS_IN_HOSPITAL.PATIENT_ID = PAT_MASTER_INDEX.PATIENT_ID(+) )
and ( ( BED_REC.WARD_CODE = #{wardCode} ) )
ORDER BY bed_no1 Asc , bed_label Asc
